rules_text:
Flying, haste
[i]Celebration[/i] – When Cordelia, Festive Flier attacks, If two or more nonland permanents entered under your control this turn, create a Food token for each opponent being attacked this combat.
[i]Festivities[/i] – Foods you control have “{4}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card, then you gain 1 life.”
